Message.Title: Obama has a plan
Message.Msg: Best I can figure he will increase the money supply to make people feel they have more wealth. Those on fixed income will get hurt. Romney has a plan. He will reduce federal spending and we will all get hurt temporarily. Regan did this in the '80s dropping the economy for brighter days ahead. This is a historic election. To my mind, either way we are done as a country. Meet you on the barricaids.
